item.title: How to show .NET version using dotnet command
item.description: From the Command Prompt on Windows or Terminal on Linux we can show the .NET version and information using dotnet command. How to display .NET SDK version To show the .NET SDK version we can use dotnet command with option version dotnet --version Example C:\>dotnet --version 5.0.101 How to display .NET information To show .NET information on your machine we can use dotnet command with option info dotnet --info
